verses.verse: From: Paul, a missionary of Jesus, the Anointed King, through what God wants in line with a promise of the life in the Anointed King Jesus.
To: Timothy, a loved child. Generosity, forgiving kindness, peace out from Father God and the Anointed King Jesus, our Master.
I have generosity for God (to whom I minister out from predecessors in a clean conscience) as I have the constant mention concerning you in my pleas night and day,
yearning to see you (having remembered your tears) so that I might be full of happiness
receiving a quiet reminder of the trust in you that is not faked, something that first had a house in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice. I have been confident that it is also in you,
which is the reason why I am reminding you again to be rekindling the gift of God that is in you through the laying on of my hands.
You see, God did not give us a spirit of cowardice, but of ability, of love, and of a proper focuser.
So you shouldn't be ashamed of what our Master witnessed, nor of me, His prisoner, but suffer tough hardships together with me for the good news in line with God's ability,

the One who rescued and invited us with a sacred invitation, not in line with our actions, but in line with His own purpose and the generosity that was given to us in the Anointed King Jesus before the times that span all time,
but now was shown through the manifestation of our Rescuer, Jesus, the Anointed King (who not only made the death useless, but illuminated life and nondeterioration through the good news),
into which I was placed as a public speaker, a missionary, and a teacher of non-Jews,

which is the reason why I also suffer these things. But I am not ashamed. You see, I know whom I have trusted, and I have been confident that He is able to guard the thing placed alongside of me for that day.
Have a prototype of messages that are healthy (that you heard from the side of me) in the trust and love in the Anointed King Jesus.
Guard the nice thing placed down alongside of you through the Sacred Spirit that has a house in us.
You realize this, that all the people in Western Turkey turned away from me, of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.
May the Master give forgiving kindness to the house of Onesiphorus because many times he refreshed me and was not ashamed of my chain.
But when he became in Rome, he looked more aggressively for me and found me.
May the Master give to him to find forgiving kindness from the side of a master in that day. And as much as he served in Ephesus, you know better than I.
